# isLess() function
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert/numbers](./esdmr.assert.numbers.md) &gt; [isLess](./esdmr.assert.numbers.isless.md)


Asserts that the given value is less than the given maximum value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isLess(value: number, maximum: number, detail?: string, ...args: unknown[]): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number | Value to assert. |
|  maximum | number |  |
|  detail | string | Extra description. |
|  args | unknown\[\] | Format arguments. |

void
